title: HACKING LAB MANUAL
welcomeMessage: This is a safe space to hone your cybersecurity skills. Learn the basic rules and start the tutorial right away!
rules: Solve the challenges in each machine to capture the "Flag".
Completing machines earns you EXP and raises your ranking.
You can use hints if you get stuck, but a small penalty will apply.
nextStepsMessage: Choose an option below to get started.
tutorialDescription: Learn about the basic flow and rules of the game.
playDescription: If you're ready, challenge a real machine right now!
startTutorialDescription: Attack a real machine with a step-by-step guide.
learnBasicsDescription: Study the essential terms and concepts for hacking.
